regen.absent_element: alert for when preset limits are exceeded
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall provide an alert when AV preset limits, such as airspeed, altitude, or fuel limits, are exceeded to ensure efficient and safe UAV operations.

regen.absent_element: alert generation when operational parameters exceed preset limits
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall provide an alert if any AV operational parameters exceed the defined preset limits.

regen.absent_element: situation of alerting when out of preset limits
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall make an alert when UAV operational parameters (airspeed, altitude, fuel) exceed the preset limits to ensure safety and efficiency.

label: TCS shall notify the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
absence: action of notifying the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
